abstract: UBS said on Friday that it had hired Yusuf Nahmiyas from Deutsche Bank for its technology, media and telecommunications mergers team.
snippet: UBS said on Friday that it had hired Yusuf Nahmiyas from Deutsche Bank for its technology, media and telecommunications mergers team.
lead_paragraph: UBS said on Friday that it had hired Yusuf Nahmiyas as a managing director for its technology, media and telecommunications mergers team. Mr. Nahmiyas was most recently at Deutsche Bank and was previously at JPMorgan Chase. He is the Swiss bank’s latest hire amid a series of high-profile defections.

headline.main: UBS Hires Tech and Media Banker From Deutsche Bank
